title: Android 13 DP2: You can now create a custom profile photo [Gallery]
content:
Android 13 seems to be doubling down on user profiles, probably as tablets become a more central focus for Google. In the latest Android 13 preview, Google is making it possible to customize your user profile photo.

moreâ€¦

The post Android 13 DP2: You can now create a custom profile photo [Gallery] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: An update to user profiles on Android 13 gives you the option to set a user profile on your account with a redesigned UI and more.
